value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral's FRESH NEW Queen Drop vs Classic! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Serral has gotten more aggressive lately in StarCraft 2. In this best-of-3 series versus Classic, the World Champion decides to go for a Queen drop using an Overlord to harass the Probes inside of Classic's bases.
